summary: A series of vignettes depicting the lives of the original Franciscan monks, including their leader and the bumbling Ginepro.
cast: Aldo Fabrizi|Gianfranco Bellini|Peparuolo|Severino Pisacane|Roberto Sorrentino|Nazario Gerardi|Arabella Lemaitre|Renzo Rossellini
keywords: saint francis of assisi|franciscan|franciscan monk|facepalm|roman catholicism
title: Francisco, juglar de Dios
